name: Conditions.NetStandard
title: Conditions built with .NET Standard Library. Forked from https://github.com/ghuntley/conditions
description: Forked from https://github.com/ghuntley/conditions available at 'https://www.nuget.org/packages/Conditions/'. Conditions is cross platform .NET standard 1.1 library helps developers to write pre- and postcondition validations in a fluent manner. Writing these validations is easy and it improves the readability and maintainability of code.
